results.title: Effect of Oral Antidiabetic Drugs on Tuberculosis Risk and Treatment Outcomes: Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis
results.text_hl: Expectedly, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ protection against @<m>DISEASE_612348</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:612348 @@@active@@@ @DISEASE_Tuberculosis @DISEASE_MESH:D014376 @@@tuberculosis@@@ was even more significant (HR 0.57; 95% CI 0.41-0.80).

citations.NLM: Meregildo-Rodriguez ED, Asmat-Rubio MG, Zavaleta-Alaya P, Vásquez-Tirado GA. Effect of Oral Antidiabetic Drugs on Tuberculosis Risk and Treatment Outcomes: Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis Trop Med Infect Dis. 2022 Oct 31;7(11):. PMID: 36355885
citations.BibTeX: @article{36355885, title={Effect of Oral Antidiabetic Drugs on Tuberculosis Risk and Treatment Outcomes: Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis}, author={Meregildo-Rodriguez ED and Asmat-Rubio MG and Zavaleta-Alaya P and Vásquez-Tirado GA}, journal={Trop Med Infect Dis}, volume={7}, number={11}}

results.title: Impact of metformin use among tuberculosis close contacts with diabetes mellitus in a nationwide cohort study
results.text_hl: Multivariate analysis revealed that healthy contacts had the lowest risk of developing @<m>DISEASE_612348</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:612348 @@@active@@@ @DISEASE_Tuberculosis_Meningeal @DISEASE_MESH:D014390 @@@TB@@@ (adjusted hazard ratio [aHR]: 0.42 [0.30-0.60]) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use partially reversed the risk associated with @DISEASE_Myotonic_Dystrophy @DISEASE_MESH:D009223 @@@DM@@@ (aHR: 0.73 [0.54-0.98]).

citations.NLM: Lee MC, Lee CH, Lee MR, Wang JY, Chen SM. Impact of metformin use among tuberculosis close contacts with diabetes mellitus in a nationwide cohort study BMC Infect Dis. 2019 Nov 6;19(1):936. PMID: 31694558
citations.BibTeX: @article{31694558, title={Impact of metformin use among tuberculosis close contacts with diabetes mellitus in a nationwide cohort study}, author={Lee MC and Lee CH and Lee MR and Wang JY and Chen SM}, journal={BMC Infect Dis}, volume={19}, number={1}, pages={936}}
